channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Krafton hikes India bet with new $670M fund
item.description: Called the Unicorn Growth Fund, the investment vehicle is a collaboration between Krafton and South Korean internet conglomerate Naver, and investor M...

item.title: Hacks, thefts and disruption: The worst data breaches of 2025
item.description: TechCrunch looks back at the biggest data breaches, disruptive cyberattacks, and damaging hacks of 2025, from the raiding of U.S. government databases...

item.title: The Best Cookbooks of 2025: Soju Party, Good Things, Salsa Daddy, Linger, and More
item.description: This year’s bumper crop looks at salsa, salads, drinking culture, home baking, and Italian cuisine.

item.title: Yann LeCun confirms his new ‘world model’ startup, reportedly seeks $5B+ valuation
item.description: Renowned AI scientist Yann LeCun confirmed on Thursday the worst-kept secret in the tech world: that he had indeed launched a new startup. Although he...

item.title: Hundreds of Cisco customers are vulnerable to new Chinese hacking campaign, researchers say
item.description: Cisco warned that Chinese government hackers are exploiting a zero-day in some of its products. Researchers now say there are hundreds of vulnerable C...

item.title: OpenAI adds new teen safety rules to ChatGPT as lawmakers weigh AI standards for minors
item.description: OpenAI updated its guidelines for how its AI models should behave with users under 18, and published new AI literacy resources for teens and parents. ...

item.title: Anonymous messaging app NGL was acquired by ‘EarnPhone’ startup Mode Mobile
item.description: Given NGL's track record of dubious growth hacking, this partnership with Mode Mobile seems like a good match.

item.title: OpenAI is reportedly trying to raise $100B at an $830B valuation
item.description: The ChatGPT maker is aiming to raise the funding by the end of the first quarter in 2026, and the company may ask sovereign wealth funds to invest in ...

item.title: Netflix is betting on podcasts to become the new daytime talk show
item.description: Netflix is making exclusive deals with podcast studios to compete with YouTube, but podcasters have mixed feelings.

item.title: Automated Holiday Party Ideas (2025): Ninja, HP Sprocket, Cricut
